titleStmt.title: The third part of The amours of Messalina wherein the secret intrigues of the four last years reign are compleated, and the love adventures of Polydorus King of the Gauls, and the late Queen of Albion, made publick / by a woman of quality ...
titleStmt.author: Woman of quality, fl. 1689-1690.
Leti, Gregorio, 1630-1701.

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed to Gregorio Leti. Cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints.
A libel on Mary of Modena, Queen consort of James II. Cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
